sections.title: Summary
sections.text: Senior Software Engineer with 10 years of combined professional experience in Elixir and C#. Currently serving as the most senior engineer in a ~10 person team, leading architectural decisions and technical direction whilst mentoring and accelerating colleagues. Passionate about maintainable systems, keeping things "delightfully boring." Obsessed with Linux, Nix, and atomic note-taking. Proven track record delivering simple, robust solutions.

subsections.title: Senior Backend Engineer, Elixir
subsections.subtitle: 7Mind (acquired by 7NXT)
items: Stepped into Staff Engineering responsibilities following departure of senior technical leadership, driving architectural decisions and technical strategy across the product team
Leading decommissioning of legacy microservices, coordinating cross-team dependencies and migration paths while ensuring service continuity during the sunset process
Built production Kubernetes infrastructure using Terraform kubernetes resources, prioritizing simplicity by removing abstractions
Strengthened engineering culture by establishing a book club, actively shaping technical demo processes and taking over coordination for other established ceremonies after senior departure
Improved team processes by introducing new methodologies and facilitating cross-squad alignment and doing "glue work"
Contributed to the delivery of a new modular monolith backend, improving maintainability and reducing complexity across the platform
Maintained production Kubernetes infrastructure, legacy codebase and new monolith ensuring stability and observability during major architectural transition
Enhanced observability through Datadog integration, structured logging, health checks and synthetic monitoring
Supported successful launches of 2 mobile applications as part of the backend squad, coordinating across product and mobile teams
Technologies: Elixir, Phoenix, Ecto, Typespec, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS, Google Cloud, Rudderstack, Algolia & Contentful
